subject: Hockey, Ice
Golf
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. and N.B.A. playoffs have losing teams, but golfer Sergio Garcia deepened his losing streak against Tiger Woods, this time with his mouth.
snippet: The N.H.L. and N.B.A. playoffs have losing teams, but golfer Sergio Garcia deepened his losing streak against Tiger Woods, this time with his mouth.
